title: Connecting To Cambridge Museum of Archaeology Server/Till
text: If you need to connect onto Cambridge Museum of Archaeology server, it is on their only till. To get access, you will need to speak to Gerard (gcd32@cam.ac.uk) to ask him to run TeamViewer QuickSupport on the server till. This till's name is MAA-TILL.
description: If you need to connect onto Cambridge Museum of Archaeology server, it is on their only till. To get access, you will need to speak to Gerard (gcd32@cam.ac.uk) to ask him to run TeamViewer QuickSupport on the server till. This till's name is MAA-TILL.
